testcase.name: Validate common scenarios for subtraction via get call
validate subtraction with two int values (happy path)
testcase.system-out:
* def operationURL = baseUrl + '/subtract' ................................ passed * def testDataInput = read('classpath:'+'resources/InputTestData.json') ... passed * def performSubtraction = function(op1,op2){return op1 - op2} ............ passed * call read('classpath:features/commons/CommonValidationsViaGet.feature') {opURL:'#(operationURL)'} . failed
Stack Trace: com.intuit.karate.exception.KarateException: ValidateSubstractionGetAPI.feature:12 - CommonValidationsViaGet.feature:29 - status code was: 200, expected: 404, response time: 18, url: http://localhost:8080/qa_testCalc_java11/restWS/subtract, response: {"result":0} [4.3:57] CommonValidationsViaGet.feature:51 - status code was: 200, expected: 404, response time: 4, url: http://localhost:8080/qa_testCalc_java11/restWS/subtract?val1=+&val2=+, response: {"result":0} CommonValidationsViaGet.feature:69 - status code was: 200, expected: 404, response time: 4, url: http://localhost:8080/qa_testCalc_java11/restWS/subtract?val1=6&val2=8&val3=7, response: {"result":-2} at ✽.* call read('classpath:features/commons/CommonValidationsViaGet.feature') {opURL:'#(operationURL)'} (ValidateSubstractionGetAPI.feature:12)
* def operationURL = baseUrl + '/subtract' ................................ passed * def testDataInput = read('classpath:'+'resources/InputTestData.json') ... passed * def performSubtraction = function(op1,op2){return op1 - op2} ............ passed Given url operationURL .................................................... passed And param val1 = testDataInput[0].operand1 ................................ passed And param val2 = testDataInput[0].operand2 ................................ passed When method get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed Then print response ....................................................... passed And match $.result == performSubtraction(testDataInput[0].operand1,testDataInput[0].operand2) . passed
